forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. High 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 28F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 38F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
